examples: 2012 is the pagan belief that it's gonna be the end.

examples: And the host of the pageant this year is Australia.

words.defineEn: the act of expressing earnest opposition or protest
words.defineVi: hành động thể hiện sự phản đối hoặc phản đối nghiêm túc

examples: The Renaissance humanists believed that man is the measure of all things, and sought to understand the world through the lens of human experience and reason.
This renaissance didn't last long.

Like, life expectancy in many areas of Europe actually went down during the Renaissance.
So was the Renaissance a thing?
words.defineEn: the revival of learning and culture
words.defineVi: sự hồi sinh của học tập và văn hóa

examples: The company was accused of being in league with the government to evade taxes.

words.defineEn: hasty and without attention to detail; not thorough

examples: You have to go through endless red tape to get a residence permit.

examples: The athlete won several consecutive championships and did not look back on their way to becoming a legend in their sport.

examples: I need someone to explain the concept of gravity to me.

So gravity does no work on objects in circular orbits.
words.defineEn: (physics) the universal force of attraction between any pair of objects with mass
